search.query: | tstats latest(classInfo.firstName) AS "First Name" latest(classInfo.lastName) AS "Last Name" latest(classInfo.email) AS "Email-Id" latest(classInfo.unixUserId) AS UnixUserId latest(classInfo.accountStatus) AS "Account Status" latest(classInfo.pwdLifeTime) AS "Password Life Time" latest(classInfo.expiration) AS Expiration from datamodel=Systems where classInfo.component=aaaUser groupby classInfo.name, classInfo.apic_host | rename classInfo.apic_host as apic_host | search $formed_apic_host$ | rename classInfo.name AS User | fields - apic_host
